name: Coin History and Payment History Management

steps.name: the company is logged into the platform for coin
the company is logged into the platform for coin
the company navigates to the Coin History page
the Coin History page should display fields for Spending, Earning, Purchase, Bonus, and Coupon Code
the company is logged into the platform for coin
the company applies a date range filter on the Coin History page
the filtered coin transactions should be displayed
the company filters by transaction type "Purchase"
only purchase transactions should be displayed
the company searches for a transaction by keyword
the matching transaction should be displayed
the company is logged into the platform for coin
the company navigates to the Payment History page
the Payment History page should display Transaction ID, Amount, Date, Payment Method, Status, and Invoice Number
the company is logged into the platform for coin
the company clicks the "Download" button on Payment History page
the payment history file should be downloaded with all transaction details

name: Job Creation and Job Management Process

steps.name: the company is logged into the application

elements.name: Display job summary on the home screen

steps.name: the company is logged into the application
the company navigates to the home screen
the company should see a list of all posted jobs with the following details
the company is logged into the application
the company navigates to the "My Draft" section
all saved draft jobs should be visible

elements.name: View more details of a posted job

steps.name: the company is logged into the application
the company clicks on the "More Details" link of a job
a detailed job description and all additional information should be displayed

name: Company Login Options - Mobile Number and Google Authentication

steps.name: the company is on the login page

elements.name: Successful login with valid mobile number and OTP

steps.name: the company is on the login page
the company enters a valid 10-digit mobile number
the company clicks on the 'Send OTP' button
a 6-digit OTP should be sent to the registered mobile number
the company enters the correct OTP within 30 seconds
the company clicks on the 'Verify OTP' button
the company should be redirected to the 'Add Profile Details' screen

name: Logout functionality
description: I want to be able to log out of the platform
So that I can securely exit my account

elements.name: Successfully logging out of the platform

steps.name: the company is logged into the platform for test
the company clicks on the Logout button
the company should be logged out of the platform
the login screen should be displayed
the company is logged in
the company navigates to the message section
the company should see a list of all message contacts
each contact should display the name, profile picture, and latest message snippet
the company is on the message section
the company clicks on "Start Chat"
the company selects a contact to start chat
the company composes and sends the first message
the message should be sent successfully
the chat should be initiated with the selected contact
the company is on the message section
the company navigates to the Pending tab
the company should see all pending messages
the messages should require a response or action
the company is on the message section
the company navigates to the Received tab
the company should see all received messages
the messages should display the sender's name, profile picture, and message status
the company is viewing received messages
the company marks a message as read or unread
the message status should be updated accordingly

elements.name: The company posts a new job

steps.name: the company is on the login page for add job
the user is on the Post a Job page
the user fills out the job form with valid data
the company selects the Looking For option
the company selects the job duration option
the company adds the minimum salary
the company adds the maximum salary
the company selects the skills
the company selects the experience
the company adds the location
the company adds the Supplemental Pay
the company adds the Benefits
the company adds the Job Description
the company selects the Job Availability Duration
the company selects the open position
the company selects send an individual email when someone applies
select Send WhatsApp updates
clicks on Save
the job preview screen should appear with all filled details
the Job post successfully
the company is on the profile setup page

elements.name: Mandatory fields must be filled to complete profile

steps.name: the company is on the profile setup page
the company fills in all mandatory fields
the company add the establishedSince
the company add the address
the company add the email address
the company add the Tye of Establishment
the company add Size Of Your Establishment
the company select Currently Hiring For
the company add the description
click on save button
the company is logged into the platform

elements.name: Viewing a resume and coin deduction

steps.name: the company is logged into the platform
the company clicks on a user profile and selects the resume option
a pop-up should display the resume and deduct Ponis from the coin balance

elements.name: Display available coins before viewing resume

steps.name: the company is logged into the platform
the company clicks to view a resume
a pop-up should display current coins with proceed and cancel options
the company is logged into the platform
the company clicks "Yes" on the coin confirmation pop-up
the resume should be displayed and Ponis deducted
the company is logged into the platform
the company clicks "Cancel" on the coin confirmation pop-up
the pop-up should close without any coin deduction
the company is logged into the platform
the company clicks "Yes" but has insufficient coins
an "Out of coins" message should appear
the company should be redirected to the coin purchase page upon confirmation
the company is logged into the platform
the company selects a coin plan
the company should be able to proceed and purchase coins
the company is logged into the platform
the company selects a custom coin amount
the custom coin purchase should be processed successfully

the updated coin balance should be displayed on the dashboard

the company views available offers
offer details should be displayed
the company is logged into the platform
the company tries to apply an expired coupon
an error message should be shown for expired coupon code
the company is logged into the platform
the company enters a manual coupon code
the discount should be applied if valid

the admin sets coin or point values for a coupon
the updated values should apply during transactions

the company should return to the previous page without changes

the system should show the total amount, coins purchased, and discounts

the company adds a GST number
it should be saved optionally
the company is logged into the platform
the company confirms purchase details
the company should proceed to the payment gateway
the company is logged into the platform
the company pays via Razorpay
the coin purchase should be confirmed
the company is logged into the platform
the company enters a coupon code
the system should validate and apply the discount
the company is logged into the platform
the same coupon code should not be used more than once
the company is logged into the platform
an invalid coupon code is entered
an error message should be displayed
the company is logged into the platform
an expired coupon code is entered
an error message should be shown
the company is logged into the platform
the platform should apply multiple coupons appropriately
the company is logged into the platform
the company should receive a confirmation message and updated coin balance
the company is logged in and on the homepage
the company is logged in and on the homepage
the company clicks on the search bar
the company leaves the input empty and triggers the search
the platform should prompt to enter a valid search term

the company clicks on the search bar
the company starts typing a search term

elements.name: Verify Privacy Settings for Phone Number Visibility

steps.name: the company is logged in and on the settings page
the company clicks on Privacy
the company selects Phone Number Visibility
the company toggles phone number visibility off
phone number should be hidden from others

elements.name: Verify Privacy Settings for Email Address Visibility

steps.name: the company is logged in and on the settings page
the company clicks on Privacy
the company selects Email Address Visibility
the company toggles email address visibility off
email address should be hidden from others
the company is logged in and on the settings page
the company clicks on Delete Account
the company clicks on Send OTP
an OTP should be sent to the registered number

elements.name: Verify Settings - Delete Account (Select Own Number)

steps.name: the company is logged in and on the settings page
the company clicks on Delete Account
the company selects their own number
clicks on Send OTP
OTP should be sent to the selected number
the company is logged in and on the settings page
the company clicks on Change Mobile Number
clicks on Send OTP
the company should receive an OTP for number change

the company enters a new mobile number
clicks on Send OTP
OTP should be sent to the new mobile number
